release.action: Added finder method on Case to find by externalId
Fixed bug that getCaseCode() returns null if a case is created but not stored yet
changed implementation to use SingletonRepository (in that way the call is threadsafe and the class is reset when shutting down), added flag interface Singleton
Added new entries in localization files.
Updated project file and dependencies and recreated eclipse .project file.
Fixed logic error getting users preferred locale in CaseBusiness

Added methods in CaseBusiness to get a users preferred IWRB by his preferred locale and deprecated getLocalizedString but improved it though. I did this because when the system sends a citizen messages they should be sent in the users preferred language!
Adding credentials property for UserCases module (required by VUF - Reykjavik).
Localizing in english, also removed some empty localization keys
Changed method in CaseBusiness to get localized case status description so that it also gets the Case itself as a parameter.
Increased maximum size of comment column in CaseLog BMP Bean.
Declaration of version for use with ePlatform release 3.1.0
Added new EventListener framework through CaseChangeEvent class. Makes it possible to attach custom handler logic when changin Statuses of Cases.
Declaration of version for use with core 3.0.5
